channel.title: How do I set weapon damage for custom models? PLZ HELP
channel.description: If I downloaded a custom weapon & wanted to set the item to set how much damage it does, how do I do that? :confused: EDIT: I'm not talking about special attacks, just weapon damage in general. Ps, I'm using the hyperion base server. And I'm new to this stuff so please don't call me stupid. It's my first time coding off of a bare base source

item.title: How do I set weapon damage for custom models? PLZ HELP

item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

super c:

If I downloaded a custom weapon & wanted to set the item to set how much damage it does, how do I do that? :confused

Overlooking the title, it seems like he wants to increase the damage of a weapon… He might mean the damage done by special attack though…

item.source: How do I set weapon damage for custom models? PLZ HELP

item.title: How do I set weapon damage for custom models? PLZ HELP
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

To change the damage a weapon does you’ll have to change how much strength bonus it gives.

1.Open item.cfg and find the item you which damage you want to increase, let’s say it’s “Dragon 2h”.
Search for your item and you should find something like this:

item = 7158	Dragon_2h_sword	A_two-handed_dragon_sword.	20000	20000	20000	-4	92	80	-4	0	0	0	0	0	-1	93	0

2. Now you can change the numbers to change what bonuses the item gives. In the above example the first 20000 is store price, the second 20000 is low alch value, the third 20000 is high alch value. The -4 is the stab bonus, the 92 is the slash bonus, the 80 is the crush bonus, the -4 is the magic bonus. The first 0 is the range bonus, the second 0 is the stab defence bonus, the thrid 0 is the slash defence bonus, the fourth 0 is the crush defence bonus, the fifth 0 is the magic defence bonus, the -1 is the range defence bonus, the 93 is the strength bonus and the last 0 is prayer bonus.

Another example:

//-----ShopID---ShopName--------Examine---------------------------------------------Shop Price--Low Alch--High Alch---Stab---Slash---Crush-----Magic----Range-[Stab]--[Slash]---[Crush]--[Magic]--[Range]--Strenght--- Prayer item = 7424 Statius's_warhammer This_item_degrades_in_combat,_and_will_turn_to_dust. 120000 120000 180000 -4 -4 123 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 114 0

Increase the items strength bonus and the weapon will make you hit higher.
Hope I helped

Read full topic
